title: the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Amendment) Act 2014 (State Authority) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2014 (state authority) (no 2) order 2024

title: the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of
heading: 2. The Maritime Area Regulatory Authority is prescribed for the purposes
text_raw:
2. The Maritime Area Regulatory Authority is prescribed for the purposes 
of paragraph (j) of the definition of “State authority” in section 31(1) of the 
National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 
2014). 

The Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications consents to the 
foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 December, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 December, 2024. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th December, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [706] 3
